TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapExtensionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class SoapExtensionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapExtensionAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，指定 SOAP 扩展应该与 XML Web services 方法一起运行。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies a SOAP extension should run with an XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将属性应用于 XML Web service 方法，将使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web service 方法配置为使用 SOAP 扩展运行。XML Web service methods created using ASP.NET can be configured to run with a SOAP extension by applying an attribute to the XML Web service method. 当向 XML Web service 方法或客户端代理类上的方法添加自定义扩展属性时，ASP.NET 将在适当的时间调用关联的扩展。When a custom extension attribute is added to an XML Web service method or a method on a client proxy class, ASP.NET invokes the associated extension at the appropriate time. 扩展属性是从派生的自定义特性类 。An extension attribute is a custom attribute class deriving from . 派生属性必须重写 属性以返回与属性关联的扩展的类型。Derived attributes must override the property to return the type of extension that is associated with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的 `TraceExtensionAttribute` 类派生自 ，以支持将特性应用于 XML Web service 客户端代理类中的 XML Web service 方法或方法。The following `TraceExtensionAttribute` class derives from to support applying the attribute to an XML Web service method or a method in an XML Web service client proxy class. 当应用于时， `TraceExtension` SOAP 扩展会与方法一起运行。When applied to either, the `TraceExtension` SOAP extension runs with the method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtensionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类必须重写 属性以返回 SOAP 扩展的类型。Derived classes must override the property to return the type of the SOAP extension. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是属性的典型实现 。The following code example is a typical implementation of the property. The priority of the SOAP extension.
